attributes.action: Pressure Saudi Arabia to overturn the Crucifixion of Ali Mohammed Al-Nimr
attributes.additional_details:
- Ali Mohammed Al-Nimr Sentenced To Crucifixion In Saudi Arabia For Attending Pro-Democracy Protest

Read more: http://www.huffingtonpost.co.uk/2015/09/22/teenager-sentenced-to-death-by-crucifixion-in-saudi-arabia_n_8177584.html

- Saudi Arabia is crucifying this teenager for taking part in a protest

Read more: http://metro.co.uk/2015/09/22/saudi-arabia-is-crucifying-this-teenager-for-taking-part-in-a-protest-5402354/
attributes.background: Ali Mohammed Al-Nimr has been sentenced to death by crucifixion by the government of Saudi Arabia for his efforts as pro-democracy activist. As a citizen of the UK, an important ally of Saudi Arabia, we have a moral duty to pressure the Saudi Arabian Government to overturn it's decision. #FreeNimr
